content: below using your lhn purl into p purl new stitch slip both loops back p2tog purl two stitches together onto your lhn pm place marker repeat repeat a good tutorial for the shadow wrap heel is the rhn right hand needle earth tones girl rm remove marker https //youtu be/fdw7rsmxvxs si=ozumz2fcak round round s zah59y rs right side rowrow and kades page 3 daedalus socks - dk pattern cuff down construction 1 cuff 4 turn heel using yarn a and 2 75mm us 2 needles of your row 1 sl1 k 13 15 17 19 ssk k1 turn choice cast on48 56 64 72 sts pm and join in row 2 sl1 p5 p2tog p1 turn the round being careful not to twist sts row 3 sl1 k6 ssk k1 turn ribbing *k1 tbl p1 repeat from * to end row 4 sl1 p7 p2tog p1 turn repeat ribbing for a further 5 rnds for shortie or 11 rnds row 5 sl1 knit to one stitch before gap ssk k1 turn for mid-calf row 6 sl1 purl to one stitch before gap p2tog p1 turn 2 patterning repeat row 5 & 6 until all heel sts are worked 14 16 18 charts on page 6 20 sts remain note letter after each round heading depicts which note some sizes may end on a ssk and p2tog colour you should use for those rnds ie b use yarn b for both rnds stated 5 heel gusset rnds 1 & 2 b *k4 sl1 k3 repeat from * to end rnds 3 & 4 a *k5 sl1 k2 repeat from * to end note you will now begin working in the round again rnds 5 & 6 b *k6 sl1 k1 repeat from * to end cut yarn a and reattach at the end of the instep note for shortie move to the heel flap after round 6 where yarn b is already attached mid-calf length continue in pattern with rs facing and using yarn a pick up and k1tbl at corner from row below to prevent hole pick up rnds 7 & 8 a *k7 sl1 repeat from * to end and k tbl 16 16 18 18 sts along the side of the rnds 9 & 10 b *sl1 k7 repeat from * to end heel k across 14 16 18 20 heel flap sts pick up rnds 11 & 12 a *k1 sl1 k6 repeat from * to end and k tbl 16 16 18 18 sts along the side of the rnds 13 & 14 b repeat rnds 9 & 10 heel pick up and k1tbl at corner from row below rnds 15 & 16 a repeat rnds 7 & 8 to prevent hole work across next 24 28 32 36 rnds 17 & 18 b repeat rnds 5 & 6 instep sts beginning after the round you left off in rnds 19 & 20 a repeat rnds 3 & 4 patterning ie round 7 if working a
